DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect different vegetable cardiovascular function subject moderately increase blood pressure . Specifically compare effect vegetables high natural content inorganic nitrate vegetable low nitrate content .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Nitrate Vegetables Blood Pressure Subjects With Prehypertension
DOC.detailed_description: Recent study indicate dietary-derived inorganic nitrate affect blood pressure human convert nitric oxide bioactivity . Here study vegetable naturally contain high amount nitrate ( green leafy vegetable ) low blood pressure whether effect attribute nitrate anion . High nitrate vegetable compare vegetable low nitrate ( e.g . tomato , sweet pepper ) . After 2 week run period subject receive vegetable low nitrate , participant randomize one three intervention . One third patient receive high-nitrate vegetable + placebo pill ( KCl ) , one third receive low-nitrate vegetable + placebo third group receive low-nitrate vegetable + nitrate pill ( KNO3 ) . The nitrate content pill precisely match nitrate content high-nitrate vegetable group .
DOC.criteria: Age 5070 year Systolic blood pressure > 130 screen visit 2 Systolic blood pressure < 120 > 159 mm Hg screen 2 Systolic blood pressure > 169 mm Hg screen 1 Chronic kidney disease Chronic rheumatic disease Insulin treat diabetes mellitus Atrial fibrillation Major cardiovascular event within 6 month Inflammatory bowel disease Malignancy , actively treat within 6 month Hepatitis Polycytemia Vera
